column1:
0853|8:53 A.M.|Friday 8:53 A.M.
Vance stared at the small army facing him
column2: including Tanzan Mino and his two pilots. This definitely was not the drill. Something had gone very
column3: very wrong. Had some of the Soviet ground crews lost their nerve and talked? Whatever had happened
column4: things were headed off the track.
